settings.item_context: Search and explore nearby Showrooms hosted by real AWOL Vision customers in your neighborhood.
settings.item_context1: Your AWOL Vision Concierge will coordinate an in-person or virtual visit.
settings.item_context2: Feel AWOL Vision for yourself and get an honest review from someone who's purchased.

settings.title: Experience AWOL Vision for Yourself
settings.content: See and feel AWOL Vision products in person at a Showroom hosted by a trusted AWOL Vision customer.

settings.title: Connect Virtually From Anywhere
settings.content: Get all your questions answered by a Showroom Host by text, phone, video chat, or email.

settings.question: 01 What is a Neighborhood Showroom?
settings.answer: Since Outer’s Neighborhood Showrooms are located in the outdoor spaces of real customers, they do not carry any inventory on hand. You can purchase products through liveouter.com during or following a visit to a Neighborhood Showroom.

settings.question: 02 How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.question: 03 Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
